autoassign.description: Integer specifying whether or not newly created deals in this pipeline should be auto-assigned to users. 0 = no, 1 = yes

currency.description: 3 character currency code for what the default currency should be for this pipeline. Example: 'thb' (Defaults to usd)

id.description: ID of the deal pipeline to update. Example: '2' (Get available pipeline IDs with "deal_pipeline_list" call)

users.description: Array of user ids for autoassign to choose from. Must be set if autoassign is set to 1.
